problem.markdown:
>>How many mandatory parameters are taken by the CALCULATE function?<<
(x) One (x) Two ( ) Three ( ) Four
[explanation] The CALCULATE function expect two parameters, the first is an expression which is the required parameter. This is the expression to be evaluated. [explanation]
problem.p: How many mandatory parameters are taken by the CALCULATE function?

div.p: The CALCULATE function expect two parameters, the first is an expression which is the required parameter. This is the expression to be evaluated.
